text: [Music]
well I I hope that uh during the five
years when I was a social studies
teacher up in the Bronx that I was uh at
least a little bit impactful on on my
students and I think um with me and my
students uh it helped that I was pretty
close to them in age um and uh I think
it helped that I was just really excited
to be teaching them uh and I think I I I
hope hopefully infected some of them
with with my uh enthusiasm for for the
subject matter I was teaching um and you
know when I look back there were some
there were some really tough kids who uh
you know a couple of whom would would
write me birthday cards on my birthday
um and and do things that were really
sweet which they probably never would
have admitted to uh amongst their
classmates but um I I did get to
experience that
that bond between teacher and student uh
for five years and it was I think really
what uh prompted me to start
donorschoose.org but um in terms of what
it is about teachers that has so many
people citing them as as their role
models
um I don't know I guess it's just that
they're they're sort of like a junior
parent at least the one that the
teachers who uh who you really like
